derivation: or עָבֻר; passive participle of H5674 (עָבַר);
outline:
1. for the sake of, on account of, because of, in order to
  2. in order that
kjv_def: because of, for (...'s sake), (intent) that, to.
strongs_def: properly, crossed, i.e. (abstractly) transit; used only adverbially, on account of, in order that
